task.title: Releasing the seat belts
task.shortdesc: It is important you are familiar with how to undo your seat belt because you may need to relesae your own or your passenger's quickly if you experience an accident in your vehicle.

step.cmd: Lift the flap on the buckle to approximately 90 degrees.
While holding the buckle flap, exert gentle forward pressure on the belt.
step.stepresult: The seat belt is released.Fold and stow the belt in the clip on the read window sill to allow passengers safe entry and exit of the vehicle
